results.title: Heute: Papageno
results.brief_description: One of Lotte Reiniger’s early silhouette films. Papageno, the happy bird catcher, is lonely all by himself with only the birds for company. He imagines the birds all turn into beautiful women. They disappear but a real woman, Papagena, comes along. When she is frightened away by a snake, Papageno tries to hang himself, but is saved by three parrots. Papagena returns and everything is happy again. Based on Mozart’s “Magic Flute” this film contains music and lyrics only.

results.title: Heureux Comme le Regard En France
results.brief_description:
Documentary on the Centre National d’Art et de Culture Georges Pompidou, better known as Beaubourg, in Paris. The Centre is presented through the events organised in 1977 by its various units, especially IRCAM (experimental music) and the Modern Art Museum.

Credits: Director, Frederic Rossif ; writer, Alain Jouffroy ; photography, Jacques Loiseleux, Jean Boffety ; music, Vangelis Papathanassiou.
Cast: Michel Duchaussoy [narration only].

results.title: Herzberg
results.brief_description: Gerhard Herzberg, winner of a Nobel Prize in 1971, is a molecular spectroscopist. This film shows Dr. Herzberg in his laboratory at the National Research Council in Ottawa where, with the aid of highly sophisticated instruments, he tracks down elusive bits of matter that are the keys to discovering what the planets, stars and the universe are made of.

results.title: Herring gull behaviour
results.creator_credit: Education Development Center and James G. Schaadt
results.brief_description: This documentary charts the life of the herring gull, a seabird. Focusing on its life within its natural habitat, the film looks at such things as the behavioural characteristics of the herring gull. These include: feeding habits, mating rituals, breeding habits etc.

results.title: Heroin
results.creator_credit: Medi-Cine, BFA Educational Media and Richard Scott
results.brief_description: Deals with expectations of drug users, the addiction cycle, the goals, problems, successes and failures of substitutive programs such as methadone therapy. Emphasises through interviews the damaging effects of heroin use. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.

results.title: Heroes of our time
results.creator_credit: Film Australia, Australian Broadcasting Commission, Chris Oliver, Catherine Marciniak and Cathy Henkel
results.brief_description: Greenpeace is one of the largest and most successful of international environmental organisations. By using large-scale direct action operations and an effective manipulation of the media, Greenpeace acts as a constant thorn in the side of multinational companies who pollute the planet. This video concentrates on the organisational structure of Greenpeace Australia, examining how specific campaigns are organised and how recruitment to the organisation occurs. We follow a successful campaign to alert public attention to the polluting of Sydney’s waterways by Caltex Petroleum Company and we follow media and business reactions to the campaign.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Australian Broadcasting Commission, Chris Oliver, Catherine Marciniak and Cathy Henkel

results.title: Hero
results.creator_credit: Beijing New Picture Film Company, EDKO Film, Elite Films, Bill Kong and Zhang Yimou
results.brief_description: Famed director Zhang Yimou delivers a spectacular martial art masterpiece that, in the style of “Roshomon”, presents a tale from numerous perspectives. Set during the Warring States period (when China was divided into seven states) the film supports various strands - a nameless soldier (Jet Li) embarks upon a dangerous quest to avenge his massacred people; a lone female warrior seeks to match the exacting standards of her master; two legendary assassins, who are also lovers, play out their final act. The graphics and set pieces of the film rival those of “Crouching tiger, hidden dragon”, being quite spectacular in nature, with an outstanding colour palette, depicted thematically. Highlights are the female warriors fighting in an autumnal forest, a lakeside showdown and the mountain top finale for the lovers. Bolstered by a top cast (Jet Li, Maggie Cheung, Tony Leung, Zhang Ziyi) Yimou creates an exciting addition to the wuxia genre, whilst sustaining a lyrical, romantic and elegiac tone.

results.title: Herman holds a sales meeting
results.brief_description: A sales manager holds a sales meeting and explains his activities and operations. Flashbacks show what he really did and said. A light-hearted treatment which will counter-balance the serious side of any sales meeting.
